summary: 2+ years experience in software development. Skilled in Python, Javascript, Machine Learning, Software Development, Testing, and Debugging. Experience in rapid prototyping using open source software. Familiar with Cloud Application Development. Enjoy solving problems by programming.

description: Improved the recommendation system of the e-commerce client, increase Click-Through rate and Conversion rate by about 200%.
Improved the search engine search results of the e-commerce client and reduce errors by more than 40%.
Developed and maintained data collecting tools using ReactJS and MongoDB.
Building recommendation system using Python and TensorFlow.
Building machine learning training pipeline using Airflow.
Visualized model performance using Google Data Studio.

projects.name: E-commerce Recommendation System
projects.description: We built a recommendation system for one of the top 3 e-commerce websites in Taiwan. The system use Fluentd and ElasticSearch to collect real time log of user behavior. The data will be extract, transform and train the Deep Learning recommendation engine automatically using Airflow. In order to deal with the massive loading of e-commerce websites, we use Kubernetes and Docker to deploy and auto scale the server. Our system has increased the click-through rate and conversion rate by about 200%.

projects.name: E-commerce Search Engine
projects.description: Built a e-commerce search engine using ElasticSearch and Bert Deep Learning model. Our Engine reduce the errors by more than 40%.
